name: LightStorming
description:
Lightstorming is a third person game where the player is put into the role of a pilot setting out to save monks and get as much score as they can. The player must collect the monks and take them to the safety skyspaces scattered throughout the level, even interacting with the lights in the sky in order to gain more score.
